languages.text: "Я чту братство служителей Омниссии. Прискорбно, что ты решил проникнуть на корабль как вор, хотя мог бы быть гостем".
"I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."
languages.original_text: "Я чту братство служителей Омниссии. Прискорбно, что ты решил проникнуть на корабль как вор, хотя мог бы быть гостем".

traits.locale_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."
"I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."
"I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."
"I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."
"I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

languages.text: 「万機神のしもべの同胞に尊敬の念を持っている。あなたが訪客としてではなく、泥棒のように不法に侵入するのを見るのは心苦しい」
languages.original_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神のしもべの同胞に尊敬の念を持っている。あなたが訪客としてではなく、泥棒のように不法に侵入するのを見るのは心苦しい」

languages.text: “我尊重欧姆尼塞亚仆人的兄弟情谊，但你并没有像客人一样堂堂正正地拜访，而是像个小偷一样溜上船，这让我很不舒服。”
languages.original_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

traits.locale_text: “我尊重欧姆尼塞亚仆人的兄弟情谊，但你并没有像客人一样堂堂正正地拜访，而是像个小偷一样溜上船，这让我很不舒服。”

languages.text: "Ich ehre die Bruderschaft der Diener des Omnissiah. Es schmerzt mich, Euch an Bord schleichen zu sehen wie ein Dieb, statt als Gast einzutreffen."
languages.original_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ehre die Bruderschaft der Diener des Omnissiah. Es schmerzt mich, Euch an Bord schleichen zu sehen wie ein Dieb, statt als Gast einzutreffen."

languages.text: « Louée soit la fraternité des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Je regrette que vous soyez monté à bord comme un brigand et non comme un hôte de marque. »
languages.original_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

traits.locale_text: « Louée soit la fraternité des serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Je regrette que vous soyez monté à bord comme un brigand et non comme un hôte de marque. »

languages.text: «Yo rindo homenaje a la hermandad de siervos del Omnissiah. Me aflige ver que se cuela a bordo como un ladrón en vez de entrar como invitado de honor».
languages.original_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

traits.locale_text: «Yo rindo homenaje a la hermandad de siervos del Omnissiah. Me aflige ver que se cuela a bordo como un ladrón en vez de entrar como invitado de honor».

languages.text: "Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının kardeşlik bağlarını onurlandırıyorum. Gemime bir misafir olarak ayak basmak yerine bir hırsız gibi izinsizce girmen beni derinden yaraladı."
languages.original_text: "I honour the fraternity of the Omnissiah's servants. It pains me to see you trespassing on board like a thief instead of arriving as a guest."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının kardeşlik bağlarını onurlandırıyorum. Gemime bir misafir olarak ayak basmak yerine, bir hırsız gibi izinsizce girmen beni derinden yaraladı."
